TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProcessInputEventHandler(object sender, ProcessInputEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProcessInputEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProcessInputEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProcessInputEventArgs)
public delegate void ProcessInputEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProcessInputEventArgs ^ e);
type ProcessInputEventHandler = delegate of obj * ProcessInputEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O é usado com o evento.The is used with the event. Habilitar o acesso a eventos de entrada do processo de área de preparação, que processa a entrada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] eventos.Process input events enable access to the staging area, which processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] events. Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nos estágios a seguir:Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. Pré-processe estágio.Pre-process stage. A Gerenciador de entrada gera o evento.The input manager raises the event. 2. Pré-notificar estágio.Pre-notify stage. A Gerenciador de entrada gera o evento.The input manager raises the event. 3. O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] evento de entrada ou de eventos são gerados.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. Pós-notificar estágio.Post-notify stage. A Gerenciador de entrada gera o evento.The input manager raises the event. 5. Estágio de pós-processamento.Post-process stage. A Gerenciador de entrada gera o evento.The input manager raises the event.
